```lisp
[
  (:action build ; Create or prepare something and update the state
    :parameters (?p - player ?i - item ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (not (built ?i ?l)))
    :effect (and (built ?i ?l) (not (at ?p ?l)))
  ),
  (:action pour
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (at ?container kitchen) (not (in ?item ?container)))
    :effect (and (in ?item ?container))
  ),
  (:action freeze ; Freeze an item to change its state from non-frozen to frozen
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?container - container ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (in ?item ?container) (at ?p ?location) (at ?container ?location))
    :effect (and (frozen ?item) (not (melted ?item)))
  ),
  (:action cut ; Cut an object into a specific shape and update its state
    :parameters (?p - player ?o - object ?s - shape ?tool - tool ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (prepared ?o) (at ?p ?location) (has_tool ?p ?tool))
    :effect (and (shaped ?o ?s) (not (prepared ?o)))
  )
]
```
